When called, this method creates a new university record using the information provided in the parameters.

When called, this method adds a new emphasis area for the specified school.

When called, this method creates a new user record using the information provided in the parameters.
addUserSchool(int, String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method saves the specified school to the user's list of saved schools.

D

deactivateUser(String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method changes the status of the user, whose username is specified as a parameter, to inactive.
deactivateUser(int) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method changes the status of the user, whose Id is specified as a parameter, to inactive.
display(String[][]) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
A private helper method used by other methods in this class to display data returned from the database for testing purposes.

When called, this method updates the university record for the university whose name is specified as a parameter, using the information provided in the parameters.
editUniversityEmphases(String, ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method deletes all the old emphasis areas for the specified school from the database and replaces them with the ones specified in the ArrayList parameter.

When called, this method updates the record of the user, whose username is specified as a parameter, using the information provided in the parameters.

When called, this method updates the record of the user, whose Id is specified as a parameter, using the information provided in the parameters.

G

getAllPossibleEmphases() - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all possible university emphases that occur in the database.
getAllSavedSchools() - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all user Ids along with their saved schools in the database.
getAllUniversities() - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all universities in the database.

When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all university records along with their emphases in the database.
getAllUsers() - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all users in the database.
getSavedSchools(int) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing all the saved schools for the user whose Id is provided as a parameter.
getSpecificUniversityRecordWithEmphases(String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing the record of the university whose name is specified in the parameter along with the emphases of the university in the database.
getSpecificUser(String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing the record(s) of the user(s) whose Username is specified as a parameter.
getSpecificUser(int) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
When called, this method returns a 2-D array of Strings containing the record of the user whose Id is specified as a parameter.

issueDBUpdate(String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
A private helper method used by other methods in this class to modify data in the database by passing a properly formatted INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE SQL query String.
issueDBURead(String) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
A private helper method used by other methods in this class to retrieve data from the database by passing a properly formatted SELECT SQL query String.

U

universities - package universities
 
UniversityDBLibrary - Class in universities
Class UniversityDBLibrary allows data retrievals from the database to be utilized by your CSCI230 class project.
UniversityDBLibrary() - Constructor for class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
 

W

wrapper(ResultSet) - Static method in class universities.UniversityDBLibrary
A private helper method used by other methods in this class to convert data returned from the database in the form of a ResultSet object into a 2-D array of Strings.
